title: Are there any Windows alternatives to INetSim?
content: I found a tool for Linux called INetSim which emulates services such as HTTP HTTPS IRC and many other. It is often used to trick malware. The problem is that INetSim works only on Linux. So I want Windows based tool for Win 7 32bit which is alternative to this ( I prefer a gui one )

answers_data.content:
Not a GUI tool, but FakeNet is a good alternative.

Mandiant's ApateDNS is a good tool for responding with fake DNS response:
